title: No penalty for dodging
body: So if you just decide that you don't like the team you can close the client without losing lp nor 5,10,20mins waiting.

replies.body: by playing the game with people you don't like you are kinda making it worse. not like the timer is long to get into another game if someone dodges. i would rather they dodge then afk.
So...just because you don't like someone you should be allowed to ruin the game for 9 other people? Sounds fair.
